comment: This was just a quick and simple beer to sip over the summer. It came out pretty nice, fermented reasonably warm so lots of banana esters from the Mangrove Jacks M20. The spicy coriander came through (although I should have cracked them more) but the orange didn't, so in future I'll use more zest (I used the zest from one orange and one mandarin). Nice and sippable though.
